titleStmt.title: Endimion, the man in the moone Playd before the Queenes Maiestie at Greenewich on Candlemas day at night, by the Chyldren of Paules.
titleStmt.author: Lyly, John, 1554?-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Charlewood, for the widdowe Broome,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
